   16: -module(connect_SUITE).
   17: 
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -define(SECURE_USER, secure_joe).
   29: -define(CERT_FILE, "priv/ssl/fake_server.pem").
   30: -define(TLS_VERSIONS, ["tlsv1", "tlsv1.1", "tlsv1.2"]).
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% Suite configuration
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     AuthMods = mongoose_helper:auth_modules(),
   38:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, AuthMods) of
   39:         true ->
   40:             {skip, "Conf reload doesn't work correctly with sample external auth"};
   41:         _ ->
   42:             [{group, c2s_noproc}, %% should be first, uses vanilla config
   43:              {group, negative},
   44:              {group, pre_xmpp_1_0},
   45:              {group, starttls},
   46:              {group, tls},
   47:              {group, ciphers_default},
   48:              {group, 'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'}]
   49:     end.
   50: 
   51: groups() ->
   52:     [{c2s_noproc, [], [reset_stream_noproc,
   53:                        starttls_noproc,
   54:                        compress_noproc]},
   55:      {negative, [], [bad_xml,
   56:                      invalid_host,
   57:                      invalid_stream_namespace]},
   58:      {pre_xmpp_1_0, [], [pre_xmpp_1_0_stream]},
   59:      {starttls, test_cases()},
   60:      {tls, generate_tls_vsn_tests()},
   61:      {ciphers_default, [], [clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers,
   62:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA',
   63:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA']},
   64:      {'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', [],
   65:       %% node2 accepts DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA exclusively (see ejabberd.cfg)
   66:       ['clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only']}].
   67: 
   68: test_cases() ->
   69:     generate_tls_vsn_tests() ++
   70:     [should_fail_with_sslv3,
   71:      should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls,
   72:      should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required].
   73: 
   74: suite() ->
   75:     escalus:suite().
   76: 
   77: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   78: %% Init & teardown
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: 
   81: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     Config0 = escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd, []}} | Config]),
   83:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0),
   84:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   85:     assert_cert_file_exists(),
   86:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])).
   87: 
   88: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   89:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])),
   90:     restore_ejabberd_node(Config),
   91:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   92: 
   93: init_per_group(c2s_noproc, Config) ->
   94:     Config;
   95: init_per_group(starttls, Config) ->
   96:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config,
   97:                              fun mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern/0),
   98:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
   99:     Config;
  100: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->
  101:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  102:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  103:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config, []),
  104:     JoeSpec = lists:keydelete(starttls, 1, proplists:get_value(?SECURE_USER, Users)),
  105:     JoeSpec2 = {?SECURE_USER, lists:keystore(ssl, 1, JoeSpec, {ssl, true})},
  106:     NewUsers = lists:keystore(?SECURE_USER, 1, Users, JoeSpec2),
  107:     lists:keystore(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers});
  108: init_per_group(ciphers_default, Config) ->
  109:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  110:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  111:     [{c2s_port, 5222} | Config];
  112: init_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  113:      node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, start, [[ejabberd]]),
  114:     [{c2s_port, 5233} | Config];
  115: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  116:     Config.
  117: 
  118: end_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  119:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, analyze, []),
  120:     Config;
  121: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  122:     Config.
  123: 
  124: generate_tls_vsn_tests() ->
  125:     [list_to_existing_atom("should_pass_with_" ++ VSN)
  126:      || VSN <- ?TLS_VERSIONS].
  127: 
  128: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  129: %% Tests
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: 
  132: bad_xml(Config) ->
  133:     %% given
  134:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  135:     %% when
  136:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_bad_xml(Spec),
  137:     %% then
  138:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  139:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  140:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  141:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"xml-not-well-formed">>, <<>>], Error),
  142:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  143: 
  144: invalid_host(Config) ->
  145:     %% given
  146:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  147:     %% when
  148:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_to_invalid_host(Spec),
  149:     %% then
  150:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  151:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  152:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  153:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"host-unknown">>, <<>>], Error),
  154:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  155: 
  156: invalid_stream_namespace(Config) ->
  157:     %% given
  158:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  159:     %% when
  160:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec),
  161:     %% then
  162:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  163:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"invalid-namespace">>, <<>>], Error),
  164:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  165: 
  166: pre_xmpp_1_0_stream(Config) ->
  167:     %% given
  168:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  169:     Steps = [
  170:              %% when
  171:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  172:              {legacy_stream_helper, failed_legacy_auth}
  173:             ],
  174:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  175:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  176:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  177: 
  178: should_fail_with_sslv3(Config) ->
  179:     %% GIVEN
  180:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  181:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, sslv3),
  182:     %% WHEN
  183:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1) of
  184:     %% THEN
  185:         _ ->
  186:             error(client_connected_using_sslv3)
  187:     catch
  188:         error:closed ->
  189:             ok
  190:     end.
  191: 
  192: should_pass_with_tlsv1(Config) ->
  193:     should_pass_with_tls(tlsv1, Config).
  194: 
  195: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.1'(Config) ->
  196:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.1', Config).
  197: 
  198: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.2'(Config) ->
  199:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.2', Config).
  200: 
  201: should_pass_with_tls(Version, Config)->
  202:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  203:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, Version),
  204: 
  205:     %% WHEN
  206:     Result = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1),
  207: 
  208:     %% THEN
  209:     ?assertMatch({ok, _, _, _}, Result).
  210: 
  211: should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls(Config) ->
  212:     %% GIVEN
  213:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  214:     {Conn, Props, Features} = start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec),
  215: 
  216:     %% WHEN
  217:     try escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props, Features) of
  218:     %% THEN
  219:         _ ->
  220:             error(authentication_without_tls_suceeded)
  221:     catch
  222:         throw:{auth_failed, User, AuthReply} ->
  223:             ?assertEqual(atom_to_binary(?SECURE_USER, utf8), User),
  224:             escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  225:                                              <<"Use of STARTTLS required">>],
  226:                            AuthReply)
  227:     end.
  228: 
  229: should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required(Config) ->
  230:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  231:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, [start_stream]),
  232:     Features = case escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_features) of
  233:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:features">>, children = Children} -> Children;
  234:         #xmlel{name = <<"features">>, children = Children} -> Children
  235:     end,
  236:     ?assertMatch([#xmlel{name = <<"starttls">>,
  237:                          children = [#xmlel{name = <<"required">>}]}],
  238:                  Features).
  239: 
  240: clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers(Config) ->
  241:     ?assert(length(ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)) > 0).
  242: 
  243: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA'(Config) ->
  244:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA",
  245:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  246: 
  247: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'(Config) ->
  248:     ?assertEqual(["DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA"],
  249:                  ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)).
  250: 
  251: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA'(Config) ->
  252:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA",
  253:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  254: 
  255: 
  256: reset_stream_noproc(Config) ->
  257:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  258:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  259:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  260:                end,
  261:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  262:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  263: 
  264:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  265:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  266:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  267:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  268:     %% Add auth element into message queue of the c2s process
  269:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  270:     ?assertThrow({timeout, auth_reply}, escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props)),
  271:     %% Sim client disconnection
  272:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  273:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  274:     %% Resume
  275:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  276:     receive
  277:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  278:             ok;
  279:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  280:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  281:         after 5000 ->
  282:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  283:     end,
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: starttls_noproc(Config) ->
  287:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  288:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  289:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  290:                end,
  291:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  292:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  293: 
  294:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  295:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  296:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  297:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  298:     %% Add starttls element into message queue of the c2s process
  299:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  300:     ?assertThrow({timeout, proceed}, escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props)),
  301:     %% Sim client disconnection
  302:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  303:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  304:     %% Resume
  305:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  306:     receive
  307:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  308:             ok;
  309:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  310:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  311:         after 5000 ->
  312:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  313:     end,
  314:     ok.
  315: 
  316: compress_noproc(Config) ->
  317:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  318:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  319:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  320:                end,
  321:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  322:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  323: 
  324:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  325:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  326:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  327:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  328:     %% Add compress element into message queue of the c2s process
  329:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  330:     ?assertThrow({timeout, compressed},
  331:                  escalus_session:compress(Conn, [{compression, <<"zlib">>}|Props])),
  332:     %% Sim client disconnection
  333:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  334:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  335:     %% Resume
  336:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  337:     receive
  338:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  339:             ok;
  340:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  341:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  342:         after 5000 ->
  343:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  344:     end,
  345:     ok.
  346: 
  347: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  348: %% Internal functions
  349: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  350: 
  351: c2s_port(Config) ->
  352:     case ?config(c2s_port, Config) of
  353:         undefined -> 5223;
  354:         Value -> Value
  355:     end.
  356: 
  357: ciphers_available_in_os() ->
  358:     CiphersStr = os:cmd("openssl ciphers 'ALL:eNULL'"),
  359:     [string:strip(C, both, $\n) || C <- string:tokens(CiphersStr, ":")].
  360: 
  361: ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config) ->
  362:     Port = c2s_port(Config),
  363:     lists:filter(fun(Cipher) ->
  364:                          openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port)
  365:                  end, ciphers_available_in_os()).
  366: 
  367: openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port) ->
  368:     PortStr = integer_to_list(Port),
  369:     Cmd = "echo '' | openssl s_client -connect localhost:" ++ PortStr ++
  370:         " -cipher " "\"" ++ Cipher ++ "\" 2>&1"
  371:         " | grep 'Cipher is " ++ Cipher ++ "'",
  372:     [] =/= os:cmd(Cmd).
  373: 
  374: restore_ejabberd_node(Config) ->
  375:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
  376:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
  377: 
  378: assert_cert_file_exists() ->
  379:     ejabberd_node_utils:file_exists(?CERT_FILE) orelse
  380:         ct:fail("cert file ~s not exists", [?CERT_FILE]).
  381: 
  382: config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, Fun) ->
  383:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file([Fun()], Config).
  384: 
  385: mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern() ->
  386:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, tls,"}.
  387: 
  388: mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern() ->
  389:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,"}.
  390: 
  391: set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec, Version) ->
  392:     [{ssl_opts, [{versions, [Version]}]} | UserSpec].
  393: 
  394: start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec) ->
  395:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_compression],
  396:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec,
  397:                                                             ConnetctionSteps),
  398:     {Conn, Props, Features}.
  399: 
  400: connect_to_invalid_host(Spec) ->
  401:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_to_invalid_host}]),
  402:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  403: 
  404: connect_to_invalid_host(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  405:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:stream_start(<<"hopefullynonexistentdomain">>,
  406:                                                    ?NS_JABBER_CLIENT)),
  407:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  408: 
  409: connect_with_bad_xml(Spec) ->
  410:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_with_bad_xml}]),
  411:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  412: 
  413: connect_with_bad_xml(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  414:     escalus_connection:send(Conn, #xmlcdata{content = "asdf\n"}),
  415:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  416: 
  417: connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec) ->
  418:     F = fun (Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  419:                 Start = stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(escalus_users:get_server([], Spec)),
  420:                 escalus:send(Conn, Start),
  421:                 {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}
  422:         end,
  423:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [F]),
  424:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  425: 
  426: stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(To) ->
  427:     legacy_stream_helper:stream_start(lists:keystore(stream_ns, 1, default_context(To),
  428:                                 {stream_ns, <<"obviously-invalid-namespace">>})).
  429: 
  430: default_context(To) ->
  431:     [{version, <<"version='1.0'">>},
  432:      {to, To},
  433:      {stream_ns, ?NS_XMPP}].
  434: 
  435: node2_rpccall(Module, Function, Args) ->
  436:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  437:     rpc:call(Node, Module, Function, Args).
  438: 
  439: 
  440: children_specs_to_pids(Children) ->
  441:     [Pid || {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children].
